alert.note: Alert for Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Merced - Madera - Mendota; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 22 at 11:00AM PST until November 23 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures from 29 to 32 degrees expected. * WHERE...Merced-Madera-Mendota, West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties, Caruthers-San Joaquin-Selma, Buttonwillow-Lost Hills-I5, Delano-Wasco-Shafter and Hanford-Corcoran-Lemoore. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
